name: Detoxicate
description:
Detoxicate

A short 3D game about recycling toxic waste

Controls: 

WASD to move

Space to jump

P to restart level - you will probably need that often.

Made by Filip Novotny (Quadratic Games) for Trijam #118 (theme: Toxicity).

Premade assets: Camera controller, floating label, one my song, some audio files downloaded from freesound.org
